_header: As Jesu Crist went upon a time / With mickle folk that followed him
_description: Gospel for Third Sunday in Lent, in ‘expanded’ Northern Homily Cycle — in couplets

BLHar4196.First Lines: Als ihesu crist went opon a tymeWith mekill folk þat folowed him…
BLHar4196.Last Lines: …Owþer to endles welth at wendeOr els to wa with owten ende
BLHar4196.Note: Preceded by Latin, “Erat ihesu crist eiciens demonium.”
BLHar4196.Attributed Title: Dominica tertia quadragesime secundum Lucam (rubric, f. 47ra)
BLHar4196.Editions:
Nevanlinna,  Sara. 
             The Northern Homily Cycle: The Expanded Version in MSS Harley 4196 and Cotton Tiberius E.vii.
             3 vols. 
             Memoires de la Societé Neophilologique de Helsinki.
         Helsinki. 38 (1972); 41 (1973); and 43 (1984): II.59-67.
